title: Studio One Pro 7 Upgrade License from Any Previous Version or Edition of Pro or Artist — Stem Separation, Splice Integration, Integrated Launcher, Virtual Instruments, Loops, & Samples Included
description: Studio One Pro 7 is the ultimate production powerhouse designed to elevate your creativity from start to finish. With over 30 new features and improvements, like fast and intuitive editing and mixing, integrated pattern workflows, time-aligning drums, award-winning notation, seamless mastering, rock-solid live performance, and Studio One Pro's pioneering drag-and-drop workflow, Studio One Pro 7 sets a new standard for creative music production and performance.
